overview: Revised (replacing Traci Lords archive footage with Tracey Adams) version.  The revelation that Traci Lords was underage caused filmmakers to revise this release. It was not that difficult because Lords' original scenes were all archive excerpts in the original version.  So old scenes starring Tracey Adams were inserted and title spelling altered.  Je Taime plays Nurse Tracy who sexually services test subjects in an experiment run by doctors to include Rachel Ryan.  Interracial sex is emphasized.  The Traci Lords scenes are archival footage from It's My Body (1985), Sizzling Suburbia (1985), Educating Mandy (1985) and Dream Lover (1985).
title: Deep Inside Traci
